00001  ######################################################################
00002 # Name:    sidebar.tcl
00003 # Author:  Trevor Williams  (phase1geo@gmail.com)
00004 # Date:    10/03/2013
00005 # Brief:   Handles the UI and related functionality associated with the
00006 #          sidebar.
00007 ######################################################################
00008 
00009 namespace eval sidebar {
00010   
00011   array set widgets {}
00012   array set images  {}
00013   
00014   ######################################################################
00015   # Creates the sidebar UI and initializes it.
00016   proc create {w} {
00017     
00018     variable widgets
00019     variable images
00020     
00021     # Create needed images
00022     set images(sopen) [image create bitmap -file [file join $::tke_dir lib images sopen.bmp] \
00023                                            -maskfile [file join $::tke_dir lib images sopen.bmp] \
00024                                            -foreground "yellow"]
00025     
00026     # Create the top-level frame
00027     set widgets(frame) [ttk::frame $w]
00028     
00029     # Add the file tree elements
00030     set widgets(tl) \
00031       [tablelist::tablelist $w.tl -columns {0 {} 0 {}} -showlabels 0 -exportselection 0 \
00032         -treecolumn 0 -treestyle aqua -forceeditendcommand 1 -expandcommand sidebar::expand_directory \
00033         -relief flat -highlightthickness 0 \
00034         -foreground [utils::get_default_foreground] -background [utils::get_default_background] \
00035         -selectforeground [utils::get_default_background] -selectbackground [utils::get_default_foreground] \
00036         -editstartcommand  "sidebar::edit_start_command" \
00037         -editendcommand    "sidebar::edit_end_command" \
00038         -tooltipaddcommand "sidebar::show_tooltip" \
00039         -tooltipdelcommand "sidebar::hide_tooltip" \
00040         -yscrollcommand    "utils::set_yscrollbar $w.vb"]
00041     set widgets(sb) [ttk::scrollbar $w.vb -orient vertical -command "$widgets(tl) yview"]
00042     
00043     $widgets(tl) columnconfigure 0 -name name   -editable 0 -formatcommand "sidebar::format_name"
00044     $widgets(tl) columnconfigure 1 -name ocount -editable 0 -hide 1
00045     
00046     bind $widgets(tl)           <<TablelistSelect>>     "sidebar::handle_selection"
00047     bind [$widgets(tl) bodytag] <Button-$::right_click> "sidebar::handle_right_click %W %x %y"
00048     bind [$widgets(tl) bodytag] <Double-Button-1>       "sidebar::handle_double_click %W %x %y"
00049     bind [$widgets(tl) bodytag] <FocusIn>               "sidebar::unhide_scrollbar"
00050     bind [$widgets(tl) bodytag] <FocusOut>              "sidebar::hide_scrollbar"
00051     bind $widgets(frame)        <Enter>                 "sidebar::unhide_scrollbar"
00052     bind $widgets(frame)        <Leave>                 "sidebar::hide_scrollbar"
00053     
00054     grid rowconfigure    $w 0 -weight 1
00055     grid columnconfigure $w 0 -weight 1
00056     grid $w.tl -row 0 -column 0 -sticky news
00057     grid $w.vb -row 0 -column 1 -sticky ns
00058     
00059     # Create directory popup
00060     set widgets(menu) [menu $w.popupMenu -tearoff 0 -postcommand "sidebar::menu_post"]
00061     
00062     # Handle traces
00063     trace variable preferences::prefs(Sidebar/IgnoreFilePatterns) w sidebar::handle_ignore_file_patterns
00064     
00065     return $w
00066     
00067   }
00068   
00069   ######################################################################
00070   # Hides the given scrollbar.
00071   proc hide_scrollbar {} {
00072     
00073     variable widgets
00074     
00075     # Set the yscrollcommand to the normal kind
00076     $widgets(tl) configure -yscrollcommand "$widgets(sb) set"
00077     
00078     # Hide the sidebar
00079     grid remove $widgets(sb)
00080     
00081   }
00082   
00083   ######################################################################
00084   # Unhides the given scrollbar (if it needs to be displayed).
00085   proc unhide_scrollbar {} {
00086     
00087     variable widgets
00088     
00089     # Set the yscrollcommand to the auto-hide version
00090     $widgets(tl) configure -yscrollcommand "utils::set_yscrollbar $widgets(sb)"
00091 
00092     # Run the set_yscrollbar command
00093     if {[llength [set sb_get [$widgets(sb) get]]] == 2} {
00094       utils::set_yscrollbar $widgets(sb) {*}$sb_get
00095     }
00096     
00097   }
00098   
00099   ######################################################################
00100   # Handles the contents of the sidebar popup menu prior to it being posted.
00101   proc menu_post {} {
00102     
00103     variable widgets
00104     
00105     # Get the current index
00106     set row [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00107     
00108     if {[$widgets(tl) parentkey $row] eq "root"} {
00109       setup_root_menu $row
00110     } elseif {[file isdirectory [$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -text]]} {
00111       setup_dir_menu $row
00112     } else {
00113       setup_file_menu $row
00114     }
00115     
00116   }
00117   
00118   ######################################################################
00119   # Sets up the popup menu to be suitable for the given directory.
00120   proc setup_dir_menu {index} {
00121     
00122     variable widgets
00123     
00124     # Clear the menu
00125     $widgets(menu) delete 0 end
00126     
00127     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "New File"] -command {
00128       sidebar::add_file_to_folder
00129     }
00130     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "New Directory"] -command {
00131       sidebar::add_folder_to_folder
00132     }
00133     
00134     $widgets(menu) add separator
00135     
00136     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Open Directory Files"] -command {
00137       sidebar::open_folder_files
00138     }
00139     
00140     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Close Directory Files"] -command {
00141       sidebar::close_folder_files
00142     }
00143     
00144     $widgets(menu) add separator
00145     
00146     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Rename"] -command {
00147       sidebar::rename_folder
00148     }
00149     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Delete"] -command {
00150       sidebar::delete_folder
00151     }
00152     
00153     $widgets(menu) add separator
00154     
00155     if {[favorites::is_favorite [$widgets(tl) cellcget $index,name -text]]} {
00156       $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Unfavorite"] -command {
00157         sidebar::unfavorite
00158       }
00159     } else {
00160       $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Favorite"] -command {
00161         sidebar::favorite
00162       }
00163     }
00164     
00165     $widgets(menu) add separator
00166     
00167     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Remove from Sidebar"] -command {
00168       sidebar::remove_folder
00169     }
00170     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Remove Parent from Sidebar"] -command {
00171       sidebar::remove_parent_folder
00172     }
00173     
00174     $widgets(menu) add separator
00175     
00176     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Make Current Working Directory"] -command {
00177       sidebar::set_current_working_directory
00178     }
00179     $widgets(menu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Refresh Directory Files"] -command {
00180       sidebar::refresh_directory_files
00181     }
00182     
00183     # Add plugins to sidebar directory popup
00184     plugins::handle_dir_popup $widgets(menu)
00185     
00186   }

00313   ######################################################################
00314   # Returns the sidebar index of the given filename.  If the filename
00315   # was not found in the sidebar, return a value of -1.
00316   proc get_index {fname} {
00317     
00318     variable widgets
00319     
00320     return [$widgets(tl) searchcolumn name $fname -descend -exact]
00321     
00322   }
00323   
00324   ######################################################################
00325   # Returns the index of the current selection.  If nothing is currently
00326   # selected, returns -1.
00327   proc get_selected_index {} {
00328     
00329     variable widgets
00330     
00331     # Get the current selection
00332     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00333     
00334     return [expr {($selected eq "") ? -1 : $selected}]
00335     
00336   }
00337   
00338   ######################################################################
00339   # Returns the information specified by attr for the file at the given
00340   # sidebar index.
00341   proc get_info {index attr} {
00342     
00343     variable widgets
00344     
00345     switch $attr {
00346       fname      { return [$widgets(tl) cellcget $index,name -text] }
00347       file_index { return [gui::get_file_index [$widgets(tl) cellcget $index,name -text]]}
00348       default    {
00349         return -code error "Illegal sidebar attribute specified ($attr)"
00350       }
00351     }
00352     
00353   }
00354   
00355   ######################################################################
00356   # Highlights (or dehighlights) the given filename in the file system
00357   # sidebar.
00358   proc highlight_filename {fname highlight} {
00359     
00360     variable widgets
00361     variable images
00362     
00363     # Find the main directory containing the file
00364     if {[set row [$widgets(tl) searchcolumn name $fname -descend -exact]] != -1} {
00365       set highlighted [expr {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -image] eq $images(sopen)}]
00366       if {$highlight} {
00367         if {!$highlighted} {
00368           update_root_count $row 1
00369         }
00370         $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $row,name -image $images(sopen)
00371       } else {
00372         $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $row,name -image ""
00373         if {$highlighted} {
00374           update_root_count $row -1
00375         }
00376       }
00377     }
00378     
00379   }
00380   
00381   ######################################################################
00382   # Adds the given directory which displays within the file browser.
00383   proc add_directory {dir} {
00384     
00385     variable widgets
00386     
00387     # Get the length of the directory
00388     set dirlen [string length $dir]
00389     
00390     # Check to see if the directory root has already been added
00391     if {[set row [$widgets(tl) searchcolumn name $dir -descend -exact]] != -1} {
00392       if {![$widgets(tl) isexpanded $row]} {
00393         $widgets(tl) expand $row -partly
00394       }
00395       update_directory $row
00396       return
00397       
00398     } else {
00399       
00400       set sub_added 0
00401       
00402       # Add the subdirectory if the parent already exists
00403       foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys root] {
00404         set name [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
00405         if {[string compare -length $dirlen $name $dir] == 0} {
00406           if {!$sub_added} {
00407             add_subdirectory root $dir $child
00408             set sub_added 1
00409           } else {
00410             $widgets(tl) delete $child
00411           }
00412         }
00413       }
00414       
00415       if {$sub_added} {
00416         return
00417       }
00418       
00419     }
00420     
00421     # Recursively add directories to the sidebar
00422     add_subdirectory root $dir
00423     
00424   }
00425   
00426   ######################################################################
00427   # Figure out if the given file should be ignored.
00428   proc ignore_file {fname} {
00429 
00430     foreach pattern [preferences::get Sidebar/IgnoreFilePatterns] {
00431       if {[string match $pattern $fname]} {
00432         return 1
00433       }
00434     }
00435     
00436     return 0
00437     
00438   }
00439   
00440   ######################################################################
00441   # Handles directory/file ordering issues
00442   proc order_files_dirs {contents} {
00443     
00444     set contents [lsort $contents]
00445     
00446     # If we need to show the folders at the top, handle this
00447     if {[preferences::get Sidebar/FoldersAtTop]} {
00448       set tmp_dirs  [list]
00449       set tmp_files [list]
00450       foreach name $contents {
00451         if {[file isdirectory $name]} {
00452           lappend tmp_dirs $name
00453         } else {
00454           lappend tmp_files $name
00455         }
00456       }
00457       set contents [concat $tmp_dirs $tmp_files]
00458     }
00459     
00460     return $contents
00461     
00462   }
00463   
00464   ######################################################################
00465   # Recursively adds the current directory and all subdirectories and files
00466   # found within it to the sidebar.
00467   proc add_subdirectory {parent dir {movekey ""}} {
00468     
00469     variable widgets
00470     variable images
00471     
00472     if {[file exists $dir]} {
00473       
00474       # Add the directory to the sidebar
00475       if {$parent eq "root"} {
00476         set parent [$widgets(tl) insertchild $parent end [list $dir 0]]
00477       }
00478       
00479       # Get the folder contents and sort them
00480       set folder_contents [order_files_dirs [glob -nocomplain -directory $dir *]]
00481       
00482       # Add all of the stuff within this directory
00483       foreach name $folder_contents {
00484         
00485         if {[file isdirectory $name]} {
00486           if {($movekey ne "") && ([$widgets(tl) cellcget $movekey,name -text] eq $name)} {
00487             $widgets(tl) move $movekey $parent end
00488           } else {
00489             set child [$widgets(tl) insertchild $parent end [list $name 0]]
00490             $widgets(tl) collapse $child
00491           }
00492         } else {
00493           if {![ignore_file $name]} {
00494             set key [$widgets(tl) insertchild $parent end [list $name 0]]
00495             if {[gui::file_exists $name]} {
00496               $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $key,name -image $images(sopen)
00497               update_root_count $key 1
00498             }
00499           }
00500         }
00501         
00502       }
00503       
00504     }
00505     
00506   }
00507   
00508   ######################################################################
00509   # Recursively updates the given directory (if the child directories
00510   # are already expanded.
00511   proc update_directory_recursively {parent} {
00512     
00513     variable widgets
00514     
00515     # If the parent is not root, update the directory
00516     if {$parent ne "root"} {
00517       update_directory $parent
00518     }
00519     
00520     # Update the child directories that are not expanded
00521     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $parent] {
00522       if {[$widgets(tl) isexpanded $child]} {
00523         update_directory_recursively $child
00524       }
00525     }
00526     
00527   }
00528   
00529   ######################################################################
00530   # Update the given directory to include (or uninclude) new file
00531   # information.
00532   proc update_directory {parent} {
00533     
00534     variable widgets
00535     variable images
00536     
00537     # Get the directory contents (removing anything that matches the
00538     # ignored file patterns)
00539     set dir_files [list]
00540     foreach dir_file [glob -nocomplain -directory [$widgets(tl) cellcget $parent,name -text] *] {
00541       if {![ignore_file $dir_file]} {
00542         lappend dir_files $dir_file
00543       }
00544     }
00545     
00546     set dir_files [lassign [order_files_dirs $dir_files] dir_file]
00547     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $parent] {
00548       set tl_file [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
00549       set compare [string compare $tl_file $dir_file]
00550       if {($compare == -1) || ($dir_file eq "")} {
00551         $widgets(tl) delete $child
00552       } else {
00553         while {1} {
00554           if {$compare == 1} {
00555             set node [$widgets(tl) insertchild $parent [$widgets(tl) childindex $child] [list $dir_file 0]]
00556             if {[file isdirectory $dir_file]} {
00557               $widgets(tl) collapse $node
00558             } elseif {[gui::file_exists $dir_file]} {
00559               $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $node,name -image $images(sopen)
00560             }
00561           }
00562           set dir_files [lassign $dir_files dir_file]
00563           if {($compare == 0) || ($dir_file eq "")} { break }
00564           set compare [string compare $tl_file $dir_file]
00565         }
00566       }
00567     }
00568     
00569   }
00570   
00571   ######################################################################
00572   # Formats the name such that the full pathname is reduced to the tail
00573   # of the pathname.
00574   proc format_name {value} {
00575     
00576     return [file tail $value]
00577     
00578   }
00579   
00580   ######################################################################
00581   # Finds the root directory of the given descendent and updates its
00582   # value +/- the value.
00583   proc update_root_count {descendant value} {
00584     
00585     variable widgets
00586     
00587     # Get the root directory in the table
00588     while {[set parent [$widgets(tl) parentkey $descendant]] ne "root"} {
00589       set descendant $parent
00590     }
00591     
00592     # Increment/decrement the descendant row by the given value
00593     set ocount [expr [$widgets(tl) cellcget $descendant,ocount -text] + $value]
00594     $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $descendant,ocount -text $ocount
00595     
00596     # If the user wants us to auto-remove when the open file count reaches 0,
00597     # remove it from the sidebar
00598     if {[preferences::get Sidebar/RemoveRootAfterLastClose] && ($ocount == 0)} {
00599       $widgets(tl) delete $descendant
00600     }
00601     
00602   }
00603   
00604   ######################################################################
00605   # Expands the currently selected directory.
00606   proc expand_directory {tbl row} {
00607     
00608     # Clean the subdirectory
00609     $tbl delete [$tbl childkeys $row]
00610 
00611     # Add the missing subdirectory
00612     add_subdirectory $row [$tbl cellcget $row,name -text]
00613     
00614   }
00615   
00616   ######################################################################
00617   # Begins the edit process.
00618   proc edit_start_command {tbl row col value} {
00619     
00620     return $value
00621     
00622   }
00623   
00624   ######################################################################
00625   # Ends the edit process.
00626   proc edit_end_command {tbl row col value} {
00627     
00628     variable images
00629     
00630     # Get the current pathname
00631     set old_name [$tbl cellcget $row,name -text]
00632     
00633     # Create the new pathname
00634     set new_name [file join [file dirname $old_name] $value]
00635 
00636     # If the value of the cell hasn't changed, do nothing else.
00637     if {$old_name eq $new_name} {
00638       return $old_name
00639     }
00640     
00641     # Change the cell so that it can't be edited directly
00642     $tbl cellconfigure $row,$col -editable 0
00643     
00644     # Perform the rename operation
00645     if {![catch { file rename -force $old_name $new_name }]} {
00646     
00647       # Place the new value in the filepath cell
00648       $tbl cellconfigure $row,name -text $new_name
00649     
00650       # If this is a displayed file, update the file information
00651       if {[$tbl cellcget $row,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
00652         gui::change_filename $old_name $new_name
00653       }
00654       
00655       # Update the directory
00656       after idle [list sidebar::update_directory [$tbl parentkey $row]]
00657       
00658       return $new_name
00659 
00660     } else {
00661       
00662       return $old_name
00663       
00664     }
00665     
00666   }
00667   
00668   ######################################################################
00669   # Displays a tooltip for each root row.
00670   proc show_tooltip {tbl row col} {
00671     
00672     if {($row >= 0) && ([$tbl parentkey $row] eq "root")} {
00673       tooltip::tooltip $tbl [$tbl cellcget $row,name -text]
00674     } else {
00675       tooltip::tooltip clear
00676     }
00677     
00678   }
00679   
00680   ######################################################################
00681   # Hides the tooltip associated with the root row.
00682   proc hide_tooltip {tbl} {
00683     
00684     tooltip::tooltip clear
00685     
00686   }
00687   
00688   ######################################################################
00689   # Handle a selection change to the sidebar.
00690   proc handle_selection {} {
00691     
00692     variable widgets
00693     variable images
00694     
00695     # Get the current selection
00696     if {[llength [set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]]]} {
00697     
00698       # If the file is currently in the notebook, make it the current tab
00699       if {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
00700         gui::set_current_tab_from_fname [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00701       }
00702       
00703     }
00704     
00705   }
00706   
00707   ######################################################################
00708   # Handles right click from the sidebar table.
00709   proc handle_right_click {W x y} {
00710     
00711     variable widgets
00712     
00713     lassign [tablelist::convEventFields $W $x $y] W x y
00714     lassign [split [$widgets(tl) containingcell $x $y] ,] row col
00715     
00716     if {$row != -1} {
00717       
00718       # Set the selection to the right-clicked element
00719       $widgets(tl) selection clear 0 end
00720       $widgets(tl) selection set $row
00721       handle_selection
00722       
00723       # Display the menu
00724       tk_popup $widgets(menu) [expr [winfo rootx $W] + $x] [expr [winfo rooty $W] + $y]
00725       
00726     }
00727     
00728   }
00729   
00730   ######################################################################
00731   # Handles double-click from the sidebar table.
00732   proc handle_double_click {W x y} {
00733     
00734     variable widgets
00735     
00736     lassign [tablelist::convEventFields $W $x $y] W x y
00737     lassign [split [$widgets(tl) containingcell $x $y] ,] row col
00738     
00739     if {$row != -1} {
00740       
00741       if {[file isfile [$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -text]]} {
00742       
00743         # Select the file
00744         $widgets(tl) selection clear 0 end
00745         $widgets(tl) selection set $row
00746       
00747         # Open the file in the viewer
00748         gui::add_file end [$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -text]
00749         
00750       } else {
00751         
00752         if {[$widgets(tl) isexpanded $row]} {
00753           $widgets(tl) collapse $row
00754         } else {
00755           $widgets(tl) expand $row
00756         }
00757         
00758       }
00759       
00760     }
00761     
00762   }
00763   
00764   ######################################################################
00765   # Adds a new file to the currently selected folder.
00766   proc add_file_to_folder {} {
00767     
00768     variable widgets
00769     
00770     # Get the currently selected row
00771     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00772     
00773     # Get the new filename from the user
00774     set fname ""
00775     if {![gui::user_response_get "File Name:" fname]} {
00776       return
00777     }
00778     
00779     # Normalize the pathname
00780     if {[file pathtype $fname] eq "relative"} {
00781       set fname [file normalize [file join [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text] $fname]]
00782     }
00783     
00784     # Create the file
00785     if {![catch { exec touch $fname }]} {
00786     
00787       # Expand the directory
00788       $widgets(tl) expand $selected -partly
00789     
00790       # Add a new file to the directory
00791       # set key [$widgets(tl) insertchild $selected 0 [list $fname 0]]
00792     
00793       # Create an empty file
00794       gui::add_file end $fname
00795     
00796     }
00797     
00798   }
00799   
00800   ######################################################################
00801   # Adds a new folder to the currently selected folder.
00802   proc add_folder_to_folder {} {
00803     
00804     variable widgets
00805     
00806     # Get the currently selected row
00807     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00808     
00809     # Get the directory name from the user
00810     set dname ""
00811     if {![gui::user_response_get "Directory Name:" dname]} {
00812       return
00813     }
00814     
00815     # Normalize the pathname
00816     if {[file pathtype $dname] eq "relative"} {
00817       set dname [file normalize [file join [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text] $dname]]
00818     }
00819     
00820     # Create the directory
00821     if {![catch { file mkdir $dname }]} {
00822     
00823       # Expand the directory
00824       $widgets(tl) expand $selected -partly
00825     
00826       # Update the directory
00827       update_directory $selected
00828     
00829     }
00830     
00831   }
00832   
00833   ######################################################################
00834   # Opens all of the files in the current directory.
00835   proc open_folder_files {} {
00836     
00837     variable widgets
00838     variable images
00839     
00840     # Get the currently selected row
00841     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00842     
00843     # Open all of the children that are not already opened
00844     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $selected] {
00845       set name [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
00846       if {([$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -image] ne $images(sopen)) && [file isfile $name]} {
00847         gui::add_file end $name
00848       }
00849     }
00850     
00851   }
00852       
00853   ######################################################################
00854   # Close all of the open files in the current directory.
00855   proc close_folder_files {} {
00856     
00857     variable widgets
00858     variable images
00859     
00860     # Get the currently selected row
00861     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00862     
00863     # Close all of the opened children
00864     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $selected] {
00865       if {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
00866         gui::close_file [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
00867       }
00868     }
00869     
00870   }

00872   ######################################################################
00873   # Allows the user to rename the currently selected folder.
00874   proc rename_folder {{row ""}} {
00875     
00876     variable widgets
00877     
00878     # Get the currently selected row
00879     if {$row eq ""} {
00880       set row [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00881     }
00882     
00883     # Make the row editable
00884     $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $row,name -editable 1
00885     $widgets(tl) editcell $row,name
00886     
00887   }
00888   
00889   ######################################################################
00890   # Allows the user to delete the currently selected folder.
00891   proc delete_folder {} {
00892     
00893     variable widgets
00894     
00895     if {[tk_messageBox -parent . -type yesno -default yes -message [msgcat::mc "Delete directory?"]] eq "yes"} {
00896       
00897       # Get the currently selected row
00898       set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00899       
00900       # Get the directory pathname
00901       set dirpath [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00902       
00903       # Delete the folder
00904       if {![catch { file delete -force $dirpath }]} {
00905         
00906         # Remove the directory from the file browser
00907         $widgets(tl) delete $selected
00908         
00909       }
00910       
00911     }
00912     
00913   }
00914   
00915   ######################################################################
00916   # Causes the currently selected folder/file to become a favorite.
00917   proc favorite {} {
00918     
00919     variable widgets
00920     
00921     # Get the currently selected row
00922     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00923     
00924     # Set the folder to be a favorite
00925     favorites::add [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00926       
00927   }

00929   ######################################################################
00930   # Causes the currently selected folder/file to become a non-favorite.
00931   proc unfavorite {} {
00932     
00933     variable widgets
00934     
00935     # Get the currently selected row
00936     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00937     
00938     # Remove the folder from the favorites list
00939     favorites::remove [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00940     
00941   }

00943   ######################################################################
00944   # Removes the selected folder from the sidebar.
00945   proc remove_folder {} {
00946     
00947     variable widgets
00948     
00949     # Get the currently selected row
00950     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00951     
00952     # Delete the row and its children
00953     $widgets(tl) delete $selected
00954     
00955   }
00956   
00957   ######################################################################
00958   # Removes the parent(s) of the currently selected folder from the sidebar.
00959   proc remove_parent_folder {} {
00960     
00961     variable widgets
00962     
00963     # Get the currently selected row
00964     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00965     
00966     # Find the child index of the ancestor of the root
00967     set child $selected
00968     while {[set parent [$widgets(tl) parentkey $child]] ne "root"} {
00969       set child $parent
00970     }
00971     
00972     # Move the currently selected row to root
00973     $widgets(tl) move $selected root [$widgets(tl) childindex $child]
00974     
00975     # Delete the child tree
00976     $widgets(tl) delete $child
00977     
00978   }
00979   
00980   ######################################################################
00981   # Sets the currently selected directory to the working directory.
00982   proc set_current_working_directory {} {
00983     
00984     variable widgets
00985     
00986     # Get the currently selected row
00987     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
00988     
00989     # Set the current working directory to the selected pathname
00990     cd [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
00991     
00992     # Update the UI
00993     gui::set_title
00994     
00995   }

01056   proc close_file {} {

01059     variable images
01060     
01061     # Get the current selection
01062     set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
01063     
01064     # If the current file is selected, close it
01065     if {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
01066

01069       
01070     }
01071     
01072   }

01075   # Allow the user to rename the currently selected file in the file
01076   # browser.
01077   proc rename_file {{row ""}} {
01078     
01079     variable widgets
01080     
01081     # Get the current selection
01082     if {$row eq ""} {

01084     }

01091   
01092   ######################################################################
01093   # Creates a duplicate of the currently selected file, adds it to the
01094   # sideband and allows the user to modify its name.
01095   proc duplicate_file {} {
01096     
01097     variable widgets
01098     
01099     # Get the current selection
01100     set row [$widgets(tl) curselection]
01101     
01102     # Get the filename of the current selection
01103     set fname [$widgets(tl) cellcget $row,name -text]
01104     
01105     # Create the default name of the duplicate file
01106     set dup_fname "[file rootname $fname] Copy[file extension $fname]"
01107     set num       1
01108     while {[file exists $dup_fname]} {
01109       set dup_fname "[file rootname $fname] Copy [incr num][file extension $fname]"
01110     }
01111     
01112     # Copy the file to create the duplicate
01113     if {![catch { file copy $fname $dup_fname } rc]} {
01114     
01115       # Add the file to the sidebar (just below the currently selected line)
01116       set new_row [$widgets(tl) insertchild \
01117         [$widgets(tl) parentkey $row] [expr [$widgets(tl) childindex $row] + 1] \
01118         [list $dup_fname 0]]
01119     
01120       # Make the new row editable
01121       $widgets(tl) cellconfigure $new_row,name -editable 1
01122       $widgets(tl) editcell      $new_row,name
01123       
01124     }
01125     
01126   }
01127   
01128   ######################################################################
01129   # Deletes the currently selected file.
01130   proc delete_file {} {
01131     
01132     variable widgets
01133     variable images
01134     
01135     # Get confirmation from the user
01136     if {[tk_messageBox -parent . -type yesno -default yes -message [msgcat::mc "Delete file?"]] eq "yes"} {
01137       
01138       # Get the current selection
01139       set selected [$widgets(tl) curselection]
01140       
01141       # Get the full pathname
01142       set fname [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -text]
01143       
01144       # Delete the file
01145       if {![catch { file delete -force $fname }]} {
01146 
01147         # Get the background color before we delete the row
01148         set bg [$widgets(tl) cellcget $selected,name -image]
01149         
01150         # Delete the row in the table
01151         $widgets(tl) delete $selected
01152 
01153         # Close the tab if the file is currently in the notebook
01154         if {$bg eq $images(sopen)} {
01155           gui::close_file $fname
01156         }
01157       
01158       }
01159       
01160     }
01161     
01162   }

01166   proc handle_ignore_file_patterns {name1 name2 op} {
01167 
01168     # Update all of the top-level directories
01169     update_directory_recursively root
01170 
01171   }

01173   ######################################################################
01174   # Handle any changes to the General/WindowTheme preference variable.
01175   proc handle_window_theme {theme} {
01176     
01177     variable widgets
01178     
01179     set foreground [utils::get_default_foreground]
01180     set background [utils::get_default_background]
01181     
01182     # Configure the tablelist widget
01183     if {[info exists widgets(tl)]} {
01184       $widgets(tl) configure -foreground $foreground -background $background
01185     }
01186     
01187   }
01188   
01189   ######################################################################
01190   # Returns a list of files specifically for use in the "find in files"
01191   # function.
01192   proc get_fif_files {} {
01193     
01194     variable widgets
01195     variable images
01196     
01197     set fif_files [list]
01198     set odirs     [list]
01199     set ofiles    [list]
01200     
01201     # Gather the lists of files, opened files and opened directories
01202     for {set i 0} {$i < [$widgets(tl) size]} {incr i} {
01203       set name [$widgets(tl) cellcget $i,name -text]
01204       if {[file isdirectory $name]} {
01205         if {[$widgets(tl) isexpanded $i] || ([$widgets(tl) parentkey $i] eq "root")} {
01206           lappend odirs $name
01207         }
01208         lappend fif_files [list $name $name]
01209       } else {
01210         if {[$widgets(tl) cellcget $i,name -image] eq $images(sopen)} {
01211           lappend ofiles $name
01212         }
01213         lappend fif_files [list $name $name]
01214       }
01215     }
01216     
01217     # Add the favorites list
01218     foreach favorite [favorites::get_list] {
01219       if {[lsearch -index 1 $fif_files $favorite] == -1} {
01220         lappend fif_files [list $favorite $favorite]
01221       }
01222     }
01223     
01224     # Add the Opened files/directories
01225     if {[llength $ofiles] > 0} {
01226       lappend fif_files [list {Opened Files} $ofiles]
01227     }
01228     if {[llength $odirs] > 0} {
01229       lappend fif_files [list {Opened Directories} $odirs]
01230     }
01231     lappend fif_files [list {Current Directory} [pwd]]
01232     
01233     return [lsort -index 0 $fif_files]
01234     
01235   }
01236   
01237   ######################################################################
01238   # Recursively expands the tablelist to show the given filename.
01239   proc show_file_helper {parent fdir} {
01240     
01241     variable widgets
01242     
01243     foreach child [$widgets(tl) childkeys $parent] {
01244       set dir [$widgets(tl) cellcget $child,name -text]
01245       if {[string compare -length [string length $dir] $fdir $dir] == 0} {
01246         $widgets(tl) expand $child -partly
01247         if {$fdir ne $dir} {
01248           show_file_helper $child $fdir
01249         }
01250         return 1
01251       }
01252     }
01253     
01254     return 0
01255     
01256   }
01257   
01258   ######################################################################
01259   # Shows the given filename in the sidebar browser.  Adds parent
01260   # directory if the file does not exist in the sidebar.
01261   proc show_file {fname} {
01262     
01263     variable widgets
01264     
01265     # Show the file in the sidebar
01266     if {![show_file_helper root [file dirname $fname]]} {
01267       add_directory [file dirname $fname]
01268     }
01269     
01270     # Put the file into view
01271     if {[set row [$widgets(tl) searchcolumn name $fname -descend -exact]] != -1} {
01272       $widgets(tl) selection clear 0 end
01273       $widgets(tl) selection set $row
01274       $widgets(tl) see $row
01275     }
01276     
01277   }
01278   
01279 }
